channel.title: [525] Mass Spec Glitch?
channel.description: Ok, I Host AJScape 525, But whenever People Click the Special Attack It AUTOMATICALLY Special's Them, So they mass click the special attack for an auto kill, Is there a way to fix this? like add an times on the special? Reply PLZ! -Lmfao
